name: Cindy's Caribbean Holiday
overview: Three great friends Cindy, Kate, and Diana want to have a fun holiday and have some exciting adventures, so they decide to go on holiday to the Caribbean. They pack their bags and set off. There are five games to play. You will get the chance to pack their bags for a great holiday, dress the girls to go to the beach, decorate their room, look for cute little rabbits that are hiding in the jungle, and gather delicious fruits. You can also complete ten pictures. There is also four cool tests to play. Find out more about yourself and your friends. But this is not all!
